Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT

This package contains code that sets up the SEURAT plugin.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Logger Called by the Decorator code when there is a problem.
SEURATElementChangedManager This class manages the persistence of SEURAT associations through resource changes such as refactoring.
SEURATPersistentPropertyTypes Utility class to maintain persistent property names and assosiated Qualified names.
SEURATPlugin The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle
SEURATResourcePropertiesManager Utility class to add, modify, get the persistent property of the resource.
SEURATStatus Creates a status element from an exception.
SEURATStore Utiltity Class to store the label decoration preference.
 

Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT Description

This package contains code that sets up the SEURAT plugin. Much of it is boiler plate – code taken from plugin demos.
